resources.string: Service is stopped. Please reselect apps
Select the apps for which you want to monitor the usage time
Please enable notification permissions to use app monitor
To monitor your app usage, we need permission to access data usage. We never share this information to any third party organisations.
We need overlay permission to show a prompt when you exceeds the daily app usage time.
If your ##app_name## usage time cross this threshold, we will advise you to stop using this app.
Solve below puzzle to unlock the app
Win this simple game to unlock the app
Your aim is to achieve the number ##target## by selecting any number in a range of ##range_low## to ##range_high##.
